paper_abstract: In this paper, we show the equivalence of the set of unitaries computable by the circuits over the Clifford and T library and the set of unitaries over the ring Z[1/root 2, i], in the single-qubit case. We report an efficient synthesis algorithm, with an exact optimality guarantee on the number of Hadamard and T gates used. We conjecture that the equivalence of the sets of unitaries implementable by circuits over the Clifford and T library and unitaries over the ring Z[1/root 2, i] holds in the n-qubit case.
paper_title: FAST AND EFFICIENT EXACT SYNTHESIS OF SINGLE-QUBIT UNITARIES GENERATED BY CLIFFORD AND T GATES
